Text:
By the way, if at all possible, during the early days of this torrent, please download (and seed) ALL of this ASAP, rather than one episode at a time. Otherwise I may be the only one seeding later episodes for a long time. And I may get tired of it!

If folks will do this, I may be able to go "initial seeding" mode in order to push out a full copy faster.

Thanks.
At the moment I am stuck at 82% & it's not moving?
Thanks so much - please keep them coming up to series 18 - will be so grateful :)
